item.title: Slovenia 🇸🇮
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description: In the corner between Italy and Austria, there is a small country hiding some truly beautiful sceneries, food and people. I am of course talking about Slovenia. I've been visiting the northern part, where also the talles mountain of Slovenia is: the Triglav, 2863m tall. This is the highest peak of Slovenia, and if you take a good look at the national flag, you will see this mountain on the flag.
item.content:encoded:
In the corner between Italy and Austria, there is a small country hiding some truly beautiful sceneries, food and people. I am of course talking about Slovenia. I’ve been visiting the northern part, where also the talles mountain of Slovenia is: the Triglav, 2863m tall. This is the highest peak of Slovenia, and if you take a good look at the national flag, you will see this mountain on the flag.

Around this mountain is the big Triglav National Park located. This national park is ideal for hiking, (mountain)biking, climbing, swimming and in the winter also skiing as there is a small ski resort located close to the lake.


Photo gallery

item.title: Sunset in the Dolomites 🇮🇹
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
The Dolomites are one of the most beautiful areas of the Alps in Europe. They are located (mostly) in North-East Italy, in the provinces of South-Tirol, Trentino and Veneto and are nowadays part of the UNESCO World Heritage Site. The Dolomites have many rugged peaks, up to a height of 3343 meters and are known …

Read more "Sunset in the Dolomites 🇮🇹"
item.content:encoded:
The Dolomites are one of the most beautiful areas of the Alps in Europe. They are located (mostly) in North-East Italy, in the provinces of South-Tirol, Trentino and Veneto and are nowadays part of the UNESCO World Heritage Site.

The Dolomites have many rugged peaks, up to a height of 3343 meters and are known for their breathtaking vistas from the tops and beautiful valleys. What better then end a day of skiing in December on top of a hill overlooking the beautiful Fassa Valley, together with a beautiful sunshine and music in the background!


Photo gallery

item.title: Diving in Bonaire 🇧🇶 🏴󠁢󠁱󠁢󠁯󠁿
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
During covid, when traveling was something that needed quite a bit of extra planning, I managed to book myself on a trip to the tropical Carribean island of Bonaire. Located about 40km north of Venazuela, Bonaire is part of the ABC islands (Aruba (most westwards), Bonaire (most eastwards) and Curacao (the middle island). Compared to …

Read more "Diving in Bonaire 🇧🇶 🏴󠁢󠁱󠁢󠁯󠁿"
item.content:encoded:
During covid, when traveling was something that needed quite a bit of extra planning, I managed to book myself on a trip to the tropical Carribean island of Bonaire. Located about 40km north of Venazuela, Bonaire is part of the ABC islands (Aruba (most westwards), Bonaire (most eastwards) and Curacao (the middle island).

Compared to their perhaps more known sisters, Bonaire feels more relaxed and it is well known for their dive sites all around the island. They call it a Diver’s Paradise!
